NOTE: I'm not in to Musical's. One could even postulate that I hate Musical's,
      and that would be awfully close to the truth.

      All the songs, the acting, costumes and the visual style somehow comes
      together stirring up, against all odds, this magic Musical Comedy flick.
      'Grease' is the purest of Escapism there is. I love this flick to death!

     
      The transfer looks great and 'Grease' has never looked better. Enjoy!
